Moveable Morphable Components Documentation
===========================================

Moveable Morphable Components (MMC) is a form of Topology Optimisation proposed by Guo et al. 

This `Python` package implements the MMC method using JAX.

.. image:: ../../images/uniform_beam_grid.gif
   :width: 400
   :alt: An animation of the MMC method running. Optimising 8 beams into a bracket.
   :class: align-right
